title: May I get some help, please?
body: It's been a few months since this incident, but I was telling a friend and he told me I should post something. I bought the second Shyvanna skin, I think it's called Iron Shyvanna? Not sure. Anyways, I spent my money on the 10$ card and got the skin. Problem is, it didn't give me the skin! Wasn't too happy about that at the time, and I'm still not. More importantly,  my game wont launch. Ive tried uninstalling and re-installing many times, but nothing works. I'd really like to get back into league! My windows tries to fix it each time I try to launch, but the game still crashes. I'm honestly upset that I can't play it!! Also, thanks in advance for the help!!  -Leah <3

replies.body:
For your issue with the missing Shyv skin, you'll need to reach out to our account specialists in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), as this will take a bit of investigation to figure out what happened.

As for your launching issue, can you give me a bit more detail as to what happens? Do you see any specific error messages when League can't launch?

I'm not home currently, but I try to launch it and it just crashes.. Then my windows support tries to fix it, but it doesn't help! The first time I tried to launch it all it said was "Error".. Nothing else, just error. Reinstalling the game didn't help, either.
I'll do that as soon is I get home on Tuesday!
